last_episode_to_air.name: Dying Jokes
last_episode_to_air.overview: Craig wraps up the stand-up set in New York City with a story about seeing someone nearly drown, and also reflects on whether he should retire.

name: Craig Ferguson Presents: Hobo Fabulous
overview: A mix of stand-up performances and behind-the-scenes documentary footage of Emmy and Peabody Award winning comedian Craig Ferguson's fifty-date tour of North America.

episodes.name: Dad Jokes
episodes.overview: Craig reflects on who he his, his reasons for getting into comedy, and the reason he's never doing another stand-up special.

episodes.name: The Bowie Joke
episodes.overview: Craig has a rough show in Cleveland and tries to figure out whether he should tell a joke about David Bowie that most crowds don't seem to like.

episodes.name: Casino Jokes
episodes.overview: Craig shares what it's like doing stand-up at a casino and tells the story of the worst zit he's ever had.

episodes.name: Sex Jokes
episodes.overview: Craig returns to Boston, home of his first ever stand-up special, and tells the story of how he lost his virginity.

episodes.name: Flying Jokes
episodes.overview: Craig tells the story of how Kurt Russell got him into flying and why he prefers aviation to show business, then reflects on his future as a comedian.

episodes.name: Dying Jokes
episodes.overview: Craig wraps up the stand-up set in New York City with a story about seeing someone nearly drown, and also reflects on whether he should retire.
